channel.title: Wilderness help[delta]
channel.description: Well guys, i've added bounty hunter (thanks to mod d crew) But when i'm in i can't attack a player that's much lower than me. How can i make it that the wildy level doesn't matter that a level 126 could attack a lvl 3? can someone help me?

item.title: Wilderness help[delta]
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“halflive9, post:1, topic:383923”]Well guys,
i’ve added bounty hunter (thanks to mod d crew)
But when i’m in i can’t attack a player that’s much lower than me. How can i make it that the wildy level doesn’t matter that a level 126 could attack a lvl 3? can someone help me?[/quote]

Mod D Crew’s Bounty Hunter is really shit, I wouldn’t suggest using it, as it rapes the process method which laggs your server.

Most people just dis-regard whatever I say, so I doubt you will even listen to my above post; but nevertheless, it should be in the private method “attack”.

Read full topic
